0.1.name: wordpress/media2commerce
0.1.description:
Plugin currently in beta - please submit feedback in the support forum, thank you

Media2Commerce is a plugin that enables you to sell uploaded media directly from WordPress.

It requires the WooCommerce shop plugin, when media is uploaded an associated product is created and a meta tag, product_link, appended to the media post meta.

Products are created as downloadable media items.
